name: cheese
notes:
# Cheese

### Truffle Parrano
  - Nutty parmesan style cheese with a liberal amount of truffle oil blended in but firm 11/10

### Pecorino Tuscano
  - Need to try again - N/A

### Jarlsberg
  - Mild, buttery, but almost refreshing. Better by the pound 10/10

### Swiss Emmentaler
  - Dry, rubbery, very firm. Has little taste but hints at being sweet and nutty. Good for melting 10/10
### Truffle Tremor
  - Aged Goat cheese blended with truffle oil 10/10
